Northern.description: The more northern of two similar features, or the northern-most of several similar features.

South-Eastern.description: The more south eastern of two similar features, or the south-eastern-most of several similar features.

Upper.description: Where the control feature is directly above a similar feature.

Lower.description: Where the control feature is directly below a similar feature.

Middle.description: Where the control feature is the middle one of a number of similar features.
